items.sentence: Have you heard about what happened in Boston?
Tom will never be able to keep this a secret.
Tom will probably be the first one to arrive.
Tom wants to be loved and accepted by others.

Tom had never done that kind of thing before.
I watched anxiously to see what might happen.
I\'ll let you tell Tom what needs to be done.
I\'ll let you think about it a little longer.
Do you still think that\'s all Tom has to do?
Tom didn\'t have time to do the job properly.
Tom\'s parents allow him to do what he wants.
Tom says that he\'ll teach French to my kids.

It\'s easy to see why people don\'t like Tom.
Tom says he hasn\'t met any of Mary children.

Tom has been treating you fairly, hasn\'t he?
Both Tom and Mary were pretty busy yesterday.
